Librarian's Compass.bonus: Earn a +20 Ink Drop bonus for any book by a new-to-you author.

Amulet of Duality.bonus: Earn a +15 Ink Drop bonus on books with multiple points of view or multiple narrators.

Scatter Brain Scarab.bonus: When equipped, gain a x3 Ink Drop bonus for reading three books at the same time.

Cloak of the Story-Weaver.bonus: Earn a permanent +10 Ink Drop bonus for books that are part of a series.

Blood Fury Tattoo.bonus: Earn a +15 Ink Drop bonus for your next book in a series.

The Bookwyrm's Scale.bonus: For every book over 500 pages, gain a +10 Ink Drop bonus.

Key of the Archive.bonus: Earn a +15 Ink Drop bonus on books where something is unlocked, either literally or figuratively.

Tome of Potential.bonus: Earn a x3 Ink Drop bonus for books over 400 pages.

Librarian's Quill.bonus: Earn a permanent +2 Paper Scraps bonus for every book you journal about after finishing.

Chalice of Restoration.bonus: Once per month, you may use this item to remove a Worn Page penalty.

Lantern of Foresight.bonus: Once per month, you may re-roll a prompt or a die roll to get a new result, and you must keep the new result.

The Scepter of Knowledge.bonus: Once per month, you may switch the genre of any quest you roll to Non-Fiction.

Gilded Painting.bonus: Earn +1 Ink Drop when reading in an ornate location.

Celestial Koi Fish.bonus: Once per month, you may use this familiar's insight to switch a genre-based quest (d6) to its opposing genre.

Tome-Bound Cat.bonus: When you choose an Atmospheric Buff for your reading session, earn a x2 Ink Drop bonus on the effect.

Pocket Dragon.bonus: Earn a +20 Ink Drop bonus for books in a fantasy series.

Garden Gnome.bonus: Earn +1 Ink Drop on any day where you read outside in nature or in a plant filled room.

Mystical Moth.bonus: Earn +1 Ink Drop on nights when you read by lamplight.

Page Sprite.bonus: Earn a x2 Ink Drop bonus on any book under 300 pages.
